law.catch_line: The bylaws of a savings bank shall provide for annual meetings of the members to:...

text.section:
The bylaws of a savings bank shall provide for annual meetings of the members to:
Elect directors;
Elect members, unless the charter of the savings bank provides for a different method of electing members; and
Transact other business.

The bylaws of a subsidiary savings bank shall provide for annual meetings of the stockholders to:
Elect directors; and
Transact other business.
